changeSet.author: Janus Chung
changeSet.sql: CREATE TYPE support_system.TICKET_STATUS AS ENUM ('NEW', 'OPEN', 'CLOSED', 'ESCALATE'); CREATE TYPE support_system.TICKET_RESOLUTION AS ENUM ('UNRESOLVED', 'RESOLVED', 'WILL_NOT_DO', 'DUPLICATE');

rollback.sql: DROP TYPE support_system.TICKET_STATUS; DROP TYPE support_system.TICKET_RESOLUTION;
